name: bdo-cli
description: BDO CLI tool for Git, GitHub, and development workflows
install: install -d ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/bin ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/lib/bdo-cli && cp -f bin/bdo-cli ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/bin/bdo && cp -rf scripts ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/lib/bdo-cli/ && chmod +x ${PREFIX:-/usr/local}/bin/bdo
